titleStmt.title: The glorious kingdom of our blessed Lord Jesus Christ on earth, rightly timed: proving it not to be till His second coming In answer to two treatises; the one, intituled, Theopolis; or, The city of God. By a nameless author. The other, A treatise of the new-heavens and new-earth. By T.M. By W.S. a servant of Christ.
titleStmt.author: W. S.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: "The city of God" and "A treatise of the new-heavens and new-earth".
With an errata slip pasted at the foot of p. 35.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
